data.name: Sample - Microsoft Intune - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Microsoft Intune" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Recover Passcode for Device
workflows.description: Recover passcode for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Recover Passcode for Device

workflows.name: Windows Defender Scan
workflows.description: Scan a windows defender device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows Defender Scan

workflows.name: Disable Lost Mode for Device
workflows.description: Disable a lost mode for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Disable Lost Mode for Device

routes.name: Start-> Disable Lost Mode for Device

workflows.name: Retire Device
workflows.description: Retire a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Retire Device

workflows.name: Logout Apple Device for Active User
workflows.description: Logout shared apple device for a active user in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Logout Apple Device for Active User

steps.name: Logout Apple Device for Active User

arguments.name: Microsoft Intune
arguments.operationTitle: Logout Apple Device for Active User

routes.name: Start-> Logout Apple Device for Active User

workflows.name: Wipe Device
workflows.description: Wipe a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Wipe Device

workflows.name: Bypass Activation Lock for Device
workflows.description: Bypass activation lock for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Bypass Activation Lock for Device

routes.name: Start-> Bypass Activation Lock for Device

workflows.name: Delete User from Apple Device
workflows.description: Deletes an user from shared apple device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Delete User from Apple Device

routes.name: Start-> Delete User from Apple Device

workflows.name: Locate a Device
workflows.description: Locate a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Locate a Device

workflows.name: Clean Windows Device
workflows.description: Clean windows of a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Clean Windows Device

workflows.name: Update Account for Windows Device
workflows.description: Updates a account for windows device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Update Account for Windows Device

routes.name: Start-> Update Account for Windows Device

workflows.name: Sync Device
workflows.description: Sync for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Sync Device

workflows.name: Update Signature for Windows Defender
workflows.description: Updates a signature for windows defender in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Update Signature for Windows Defender

routes.name: Start-> Update Signature for Windows Defender

workflows.name: Get Managed Device Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific managed device from Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Get Managed Device Details

workflows.name: Reset Passcode Device
workflows.description: Reset passcode for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Reset Passcode Device

workflows.name: Shutdown Device
workflows.description: Shutdown a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Shutdown Device

workflows.name: Request Remote Assistance for Device
workflows.description: Request a remote assistance for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Request Remote Assistance for Device

routes.name: Start-> Request Remote Assistance for Device

workflows.name: Reboot Device
workflows.description: Reboot a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Reboot Device

workflows.name: Get Managed Devices List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of managed devices from Microsoft Intune.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Get Managed Devices List

workflows.name: Remote Lock Device
workflows.description: Remote Lock for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Lock Device
